name: AimTrainnerDemo
description:
Hello guys, this just a simple aim trainer game . I am currently learning unreal engine blueprints. I learned this from a unreal engine course.  for my next project i am going to make a similar project like this but add my own spin. For now i hope you enjoy this small project game i made. 

extract the game using winrar or 7zip and click the exe file to play.

Controls

1) left click to shoot.

2) right click to aim

3) esc to quit game.

4) click green button in game to start spawning targets

5) click red button in game to restart the level.
